Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy35RV.name: firstUppercased
Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy35RV.abstract: This extension lets us uppercase only the first letter of the string (used for weekdays).

Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy35RV.name: urlEncodedString
Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy35RV.abstract: The following calculated property comes from this: http://stackoverflow.com/a/27736118/879365

Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy35RV.name: index(of:options:)
Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy35RV.abstract: This allows us to find the first index of a substring.

Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy35RV.name: endIndex(of:options:)
Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy35RV.abstract: This allows us to find the last index of a substring.

Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy35RV.name: indexes(of:options:)
Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy35RV.abstract: This returns an Array of indexes that map all the occurrences of a given substring.

Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy35RV.name: ranges(of:options:)
Extensions/StringProtocol.html#/s:Sy35RV.abstract: This returns an Array of Index Ranges that map all the occurrences of a given substring.

Extensions/StringProtocol.html.name: StringProtocol
Extensions/StringProtocol.html.abstract: These are a variety of cool String extensions that add some great extra cheese on the pizza.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.name: incorrectKeys(invalidElements:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.abstract: Some elements were presented that do not fit our keys. The associated value is an Array of the failing keys.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.name: valuesNotPlistCompatible(invalidElements:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.abstract: Not all of the elements in the _values Dictionary are Plist-Compatible. The associated value is an Array of the failing keys.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.name: noStoredPrefsForKey(key:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.abstract: We were not able to find a stored pref for the given key. The associated value is the key we are looking for.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.name: unknownError(error:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.abstract: Unknown thrown error. The associated value is the error (if any).

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:35RV.name: _values
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:35RV.abstract: This is the Dictionary. It’s private, and shouldn’t need to be accessed outside this base class.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:35RV.name: _save()
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:35RV.abstract: This is a private method that saves the current contents of the _values Dictionary to persistent storage, keyed by the value of the key property.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:35RV.name: _load()
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:35RV.abstract: This is a private method that reads in the data from persistent storage for this instance (using the key property), and loads the _values Dictionary property.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.name: PrefsError
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs/PrefsError.h.abstract: Errors that Can be thrown from methods in this class

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:35RV.name: key
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:35RV.abstract: This is the key that is used to store and fetch the collection of data to be used to populate the _values Dictionary.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:35RV.name: lastError
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:35RV.abstract: This is any error that was thrown during a save or a load.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:35RV.name: keys
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:35RV.abstract: This calculated property MUST be overridden by subclasses.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:35RV.name: values
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:35RV.abstract: This is an accessor for the _values Dictionary. Before it returns the Dictionary, it loads data from persistent storage.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@R.name: init()
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/c:@M@R.abstract: The default initializer uses the current subclass typename as the main key.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:35RV.name: init(key:values:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html#/s:35RV.abstract: You can initialize instances with a key and some initial data values.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: prefs
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: This is the preferences object. It is instantiated at runtime, and left on its own.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: The Dictionary Editor.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: The Label for the Date Picker.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: datePicker
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: The Date Picker

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: resetButton
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: The Reset Button

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: dictionaryKeys
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: The keys for the Dictionary, as a sorted Array of String

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: resetButtonHit(_:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: Called when the reset button is hit.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: integerTextEntryChanged(_:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: Called when text changes in the Integer Text Entry Text Field.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: stringTextEntryChanged(_:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: Called when text changes in the String Text Entry Text Field.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: arrayTextEntryChanged(_:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: Called when text changes in the Selected Array Element Text Entry Text Field.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: dictionaryTextEntryChanged(_:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: Called when text changes in the Selected Dictionary Element Text Entry Text Field.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: dateChanged(_:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: Called when the Date Picker changes.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: loadDefaultsFromSettings()
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: This loads the values from the main defaults, and sets them into our stored prefs.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: saveDefaultsToSettings()
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: This takes what’s in our stored prefs, and saves them to the main defaults.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: viewDidLoad()
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: Called when the view initially loads.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: viewWillLayoutSubviews()
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: Called when the view will lay out its subviews.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: numberOfComponents(in:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: This is the call to tell the Picker View how many components (always 1)

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: pickerView(_:numberOfRowsInComponent:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: This is the call to tell the Picker View how many components (always 1)

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: pickerView(_:titleForRow:forComponent:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: This is called to get the PickerView to return a Title.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: pickerView(_:didSelectRow:inComponent:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: This is called when a new row is selected in a picker. It sets up the text entry field.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: window
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: The app window.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet/_Ind.name: dictionary
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet/_Ind.abstract: A Dictionary of String, keyed by String

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.name: _myKeys
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.abstract: This is an Array of String, containing the keys used to store and retrieve the values from persistent storage.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.name: _myValues
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.abstract: This Dictionary contains our default (initial) values for the contained data.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet/_Ind.name: _Indexes
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet/_Ind.abstract: These are indexes, into the main keys Array. They represent different types of stored properties.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.name: keys
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.abstract: This is an Array of String, containing the keys used to store and retrieve the values from persistent storage. READ-ONLY

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.name: intKey
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.abstract: The Key (the Label) for the Integer Value. READ-ONLY

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.name: stringKey
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.abstract: The Key (the Label) for the String Value. READ-ONLY

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.name: arrayKey
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.abstract: The Key (the Label) for the Array Value. READ-ONLY

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.name: dictionaryKey
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.abstract: The Key (the Label) for the Dictionary Value. READ-ONLY

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.name: dateKey
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.abstract: The Key (the Label) for the Date Value. READ-ONLY

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.name: reset()
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.abstract: This resets everything to the default settings.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.name: init(key:)
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.abstract: The keyed initializer. It sends in our default values, if there were no previous ones. Bit primitive, but this is for test harnesses.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.name: RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_TestSet.html.abstract: This class is the concrete subclass of RVS_PersistentPrefs that implements a few simple data types.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarness_AppDelegate
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: The main application delegate class. It simply give the window a place to hang its hat, and registers the app defaults.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.name: RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarness_ViewController
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs_iOS_TestHarn.abstract: In iOS, we don’t have good support for KVO, so we rely on good old-fashioned IBAction handlers and setup.

Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html.name: RVS_PersistentPrefs
Classes/RVS_PersistentPrefs.html.abstract: This class is designed to act as an abstract base class, providing a simple Dictionary datastore that is stored in the UserDefaults in the Application Bundle. It is designed to be reliable, and extremely simple to use.
